patthana8.64:4.1: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.64:5.1: Nanapītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.64:6.1: Napītisahagatañca nanapītisahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.64:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
